DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Hormone refractory prostate cancer ( HRPC ) & # 8211 ; progressive disease despite androgen deprivation serum testosterone < 50ng/dL ; progression define either : 1 . Rising PSA 6 month least 50 % increase 1st 3rd measurement , 3rd measurement > 2.0 ng/ml ; 2 . Progression metastatic lesion bone scan , 3 . Progression lymph node metastasis CT scan . Zubrod ECOG performance status 01 . Three few bone metastases bone scan minimal symptom . No lymph node lesion great 3.0 cm long diameter . Adequate hematological , hepatic renal function . Exclusion Criteria History active malignancy . Prior chemotherapy , radiation therapy , immunosuppressive investigational therapy metastatic disease previous 12 month . Strong opioids , immunosuppressive , megestrol acetate estrogenic hormone ( e.g. , Saw Palmetto , PCSPES ) within 1 month prior enrollment . Brain , liver , lung metastasis ; uncontrolled heart , liver , lung , renal disease serious illness . Prior splenectomy . History severe asthma , anaphylaxis , serious adverse reaction vaccine antigen include skin test . History moderate severe low limb lymphedema , recent sign deep venous thrombosis ( DVT ) thromboembolic disease , impend stroke . History immunodeficiency autoimmune disease ; positive HIV , HbsAg antiHCV . Impending untreated spinal cord compression urinary outlet obstruction . Any medication might affect immune function . ( Exceptions : Nonprescription dose NSAIDS ; acetaminophen aspirin ; low dos antihistamine therapy ; normal range dose vitamin ; H2 blocker ) .
